website_summaries.verdict: Reliable Dell laptop that can handle various flavors of Linux as well as Windows 10.
pros: Generous feature set, great I/O and port options and class-leading keyboard

customer_reviews.title: This laptop has given me issues since I purchased it ...
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has given me issues since I purchased it. The screen frequently freezes (white or black screen) and often has issues powering on at all. I have replaced the hard drive and RAM and even updated the operating system, drivers, & firmware - still the same issues. Highly dissatisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM REED

customer_reviews.title: Screen keeps dimming! Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping but it looks old & screen is DIMMING every time. Unable to correct by adjusting. Not happy. My other dell lattitude I bought from Super Agena seller is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie P

customer_reviews.title: Clunky, poor battery, Windows 8 expired, and poor RAM
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop and pretty good processor except running on Windows 8. Battery was bad and didn't last longer than hour on full brightness. A bit disappointing on top of random issues with internet continuously cutting out for no obvious evident reason. Gave this up due to battery and choosing to update and get more RAM, or buy new laptop - I'm a college student (and I did the math), but I did not have the time to wait for a new updated and improved laptop on top of a new battery purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Good used portable that was in decent condition. Scratches on cover and some odor on the case that I used a orange oil to mask. Came with Windows 7 Pro and a 250Gb hard drive. Only complaint is that it was advertised to have 4Gb RAM, but there was only 3Gb. I bought 8Gb of RAM online for $55 to replace the 3Gb. Graphics are somewhat slow, but all components are working flawlessly. I partitioned this computer to dual boot Windows 7 and Ubuntu Mate Linux. This was a good purchase for the money paid (~$150) to get a used computer that was in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot W.

customer_reviews.title: I love this Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I love this Laptop, deleted the Google Chrome it had on it and it types wonderful, everything seems to work, I contacted the seller and they will help me to understand a few buttons on it and what they are for, I am very please and happy with this used laptop.This laptop did not say if there was a charger included, and that was a concern, But it was Included thank God, I would Highly Recommend this company and this Laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Okeke

customer_reviews.title: So far an excellent laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far an excellent laptop for the price. Mine was in excellent shape and no wear. IF YOU GET a blue screen of death when running the Windows Update let it be known for me and others it was the NVIDIA update from the Microsoft Update. Avoid that, update the video drivers through the NVIDIA website.
customer_reviews.author: wrbrower

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this!
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk! Touchpad buttons broke within the first couple days, then the battery charging cord stopped working. Thankfully Amazon has wonderful return policies!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Quint

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The battery came damaged and I had to spend money on replacements and the disk was very old
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Bad products, Horrible company!
customer_reviews.text: The laptop has many glitches in it, the curser did not work, and the company gives you a hard time for a refund even with proof that the item is on its way back. Word to the wise..TREAD LIGHTLY WITH THIS COMPANY!
customer_reviews.author: Jamella D

customer_reviews.title: Came very quickly and in great condition. This laptop has a robust and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Came very quickly and in great condition. This laptop has a robust and easy to use Bios. It was very easy to install a SSD and load on Linux. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Truman

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a laptop for personal banking and recording software. I plugged this into a couple of monitors and it worked fine. I had to update Windows 7 but that is not really a Dell issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bama blues man

customer_reviews.title: Great deal more than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent looking and working laptop computer for the money. More than met me expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price. We use this model at work. It's a workhorse. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Fadi Shakkour

customer_reviews.title: poo
customer_reviews.text: this thing is a hunk of crap bc I spilled water on it and it failed. But I'm a stupid kid who can't do a basic task
customer_reviews.author: chinacat
